DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the efficacy and safety of miglitol in Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes that is insufficiently controlled diet alone.
DOC.brief_title: Double-Blind Study of Miglitol in Japanese With type2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type2 diabetic patient on Dietary Therapy Criteria for postprandial plasma glucose and HbA1c are met Type1 diabetes Patients treated with antidiabetic drugs or Insulin
